formatDescription: VTK files are outputs of the Visualization Toolkit, an open source, "Object-Oriented Approach to 3D Graphics" software that supports image processing, modeling, scientific visualization and 3D computer graphics. The Visualization Software and the corresponding vtk file outputs date from 1994. VTK are serial formats and are considered a legacy format.
provenanceCompoundName: Digital Research Alliance of Canada - FRDR / Alliance de recherche numérique du Canada – DFDR

internalSignatures.name: vtk v.1
internalSignatures.note: BOF; Offset: 0; Magic Bytes:' # vtk DataFile Version 1.0'
